text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL63 15.6" Full HD Gaming Notebook Computer, Intel Core i7-8750H 2.20GHz, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, Windows 10 Home!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL63 15.6" Full HD Gaming Notebook Computer, Intel Core i7-8750H 2.20GHz, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, Windows 10 Home!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GL63 15.6" Full HD Gaming Notebook Computer, Intel Core i7-8750H 2.20GHz, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, Windows 10 Home is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL63 15.6" Full HD Gaming Notebook Computer, Intel Core i7-8750H 2.20GHz, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, Windows 10 Home!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the speakers on the MSI GL63 15.6" Full HD Gaming Notebook Computer, Intel Core i7-8750H 2.20GHz, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, Windows 10 Home. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
